title: HOUSE MATE NEEDED - HEART OF LOGAN SQ - TWO FLAT GRAYSTONE
posting_body: One room available in a Logan Square two bed/one bath apartment starting August 1st.
The apartment has a shared kitchen space with a spacious walk-in pantry and a large living room and dining room that are mostly furnished.
There is also a 3rd small bedroom that is used as a guest room.
Apartment is located above landlord's home, just 3 blocks from the LS blue line.
New roommate will get the bigger of the two bedrooms.
A screened-in patio overlooks the beautiful backyard/garden and a fence surrounds the entire home.
Looking for a respectful, kind, clean roommate.
(water is included in rent, utilities range around $100 or less)If you're interested, please contact me via email.
I am a 20-something flight attendant who moved to Chicago a year ago from Washington, DC.
I love what the city has to offer and enjoy exploring the neighborhood, trying new restaurants, relaxing at home reading books, and going to Oak street beach.
When I’m not working or traveling, I enjoy spending time at home.
I love cooking and cook mostly all of my meals.
My sleep schedule is odd and ever-changing due to my job, and it's important to me that the new housemate be respectful of this.
